sourcesContent:
<template>
  <canvas id="myCanvas"></canvas>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "MaskCanvas",
  data() {
    return {
      canvas: "",
      ctx: "",
    };
  },
  mounted() {
    var that = this;
    that.canvas = document.getElementById("myCanvas");
    that.ctx = that.canvas.getContext("2d");
    // console.log("canvas", that.canvas);
    // console.log("ctx", that.ctx);
    that.canvas.width = window.innerWidth;
    that.canvas.height = window.innerHeight;
    window.onresize = that.syncWH();
  },
  methods: {
    //同步画布宽高
    syncWH() {
      this.canvas.width = window.innerWidth;
      this.canvas.height = window.innerHeight;
    },

    //随机函数
    randomNum(m, n) {
      return Math.floor(Math.random() * (n - m + 1) + m);
    },
    //随机颜色
    randomColor() {
      return (
        "rgb(" +
        randomNum(0, 255) +
        "," +
        randomNum(0, 255) +
        "," +
        randomNum(0, 255) +
        ")"
      );
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style lang="less" scoped>
#myCanvas {
  position: absolute;
  /*设置定位*/
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  z-index: -1;
  /*使画布基于最低层*/
  background: #0e1729;
  /*画布背景色*/
}
</style>
